description: The YTD file is located in the directory that the GTA V game is installed on your computer with the other game resource files. It often accompanies a .GFX file with the same filename.
You will most likely only come across the YTD file if you are modifying gameplay in GTA V. You can use the Open IV program, which is used for modding GTA V, Grand Theft Auto IV, and Max Payne 3.
